title: Exciting peace of history
text:
The Acropolis and it's slopes are fascinating tour to the ancient Greece.
The top of the hill with Parthenon temple is breathtaking.
If the weather is sunny, bring water and a hat. In every weather bring convenient shoes for walk.
In the winter season the ticket price is 10 euro. Buy it online. We bought Skip the line ticket for 13 euro, and it was no line at all, and you have to exchange your voucher prior to entering the site - just time waist.

title: Impressive museum
text:
We did the Acropolis museum after the visit to Acropolis itself, and I think it's just the right order.
The museum is spacious, very lighted, nice to walk through.
The upper floor is model of Parthenon, with many reconstructed elements.
The other two floors contains remains from other Acropolis temples.
In the entrance floor there is a glass floor, and you can see the excavations through the glass.
